POWERED by FUSION

An individual post follows.

Mark Your Calendaring Application

The time is finally nigh. 5dots releases Disaster Action Kid, his first full-length CD, on our Adjective Records label April 27th. He’s announced as much here.

To celebrate, we’re having a release party, announced here. The nitty gritty:

Saturday, April 30th at The Warehouse Next Door 1017 7th Street NW, Washington DC Doors at 9, $8 All ages

We’ve got several great acts before the big 5 does his thing. I’ll be spinning between the other band’s sets all night and then softening up the place for 5dots with a crazed genre-demolishing mix of my own.

Attendance is clearly mandatory.

—Apr 04, 2004
